short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download your own GSTR1, GSTR2A, GSTR2B, GSTR3B & GSTR9 in JSON format from the GST Portal. | Devloped by xlsdeal.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a free Tool; that helps you to Bulk download(s) of {GSTR1, GSTR2A, GSR2B, GSTR3B &  GSTR9} in JSON data files format from the GST Portal at one place by single click for several months at once.

This will reduce your time and effort to move one window to another and waiting for download the GST data and for further reconciliations.


This will be your most efficient way to download offline gst data without using any paid/third party apis.


Thanks for using 'XLSDEAL GSTR-N" tool developed by www.gst.xlsdeal.com

Notes: You can visualize your downloaded json file data in the tabular format(s) or export to excel file format from the website gst.xlsdeal.com separately.
